summary: The diff shows a substantial rewrite of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx`, but the provided diff is truncated, so key V54-specific behaviors (manifesto intro cycling text, share + WhatsApp bridge, and robust deploy insertion) cannot be conclusively verified from the available evidence. Two additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository metadata/summary files that are not part of the requested frontend V54 overwrite requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only specify changes needed to fully overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the provided V54 code and apply minimal mechanical compile fixes; it does not request updating project summary/state or file summary metadata.
